XRReferenceSpaceEventXRReferenceSpaceEve.summary:
The XRReferenceSpaceEvent()
constructor is used to create a new object, which
represents an event regarding the state of a WebXR reference space object,
.
XRReferenceSpaceEventXRReferenceSpaceEve.returns: A new XRReferenceSpaceEvent object, initialized as defined by the input parameters.
